title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 33.1 - Authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 33.1 - Authority

State Regulations

This Part is promulgated pursuant to the authority of
subdivision 9-a of section
10
of the Highway

Law, which provides the commissioner with authority to prescribe rules and
regulations fixing the duties of county and town superintendents in respect to
oil spill control. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
33.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
